hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select EOTC.EOTC_ID as EOOC_ID, EOTC.CREATOR as CREATOR, EOTC.CREATE_TIME as CREATE_TIME, EOTC.MODIFIER as MODIFIER, EOTC.MODIFY_TIME as MODIFY_TIME, EOTC.REC_VER as REC_VER, EOTC.REC_STATUS as REC_STATUS, EOTC.ORG_ID as ORG_ID, EOTC.PM_CODE as PM_CODE, EOTC.EOTC_CONTAINER_TYPE_CODE as EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_CODE, EOTC.EOTC_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME as EOOC_CONTAINER_TYPE_NAME, EOTC.EOTC_QUANTITY as EOOC_QUANTITY, EOTC.EOTC_REMARK as EOOC_REMARK from EO_TEMPLATE_ORDER_CONTAINER EOTC where 1=1 << AND EOTC.EOTC_EOTO_CODE LIKE :code>> << AND EOTC.ORG_ID =:orgId >>
